descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for medical products from M.A. Wollacker, we see a detailed of the advertised product and its effects during certain diseases as well as contact details of the wholesaler and producer.

inscription.text: The Oxyquinotheine Antipyretic and Analgesic In the form of Dr. Faivre's Cachets combines in a condensed from the properties of Quinine, the Salicylates and Methyltheobromine, without any of their disadvantages. The Cachets are universally appreciated by the Medical Faculty, and exert a safe and certain action
in a few minutes on plains due to Neuralgia, rheumatiam, gout. influenza and nervous troubles. The pains of meningitis and tabes yield to the action of these cachets with almost equal rapidity.
Sole Agents in India Établissements M.A. Wollacker Paris - 31, Rue Saint-Georges, (9e) M.A. Wollacker (France) P.O. Box 832 Bombay

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

The Cachets are universally appreciated by the Medical Faculty, and exert a safe and certain action
